title: MamunMKY
author: MamunMKY
content: WEBSITE      TWITTER      TELEGRAM      BOUNTY GROUP 1. Bounty campaign will be managed by MamunMKY2. $5K worth of MahaDAO coin are allocated for this Bounty.3. The bounty program was launched on 30.04.2023 and will run until 07.05.2023Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed, bounty manager reserves the right to make changes to the conditions at any time.MamunMKY team can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers. We are responsible only for managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity. Participating in this bounty campaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.1. All participants must join the MahaDAO official Telegram Group2. All participants must join MamunMKY Telegram Group3. Talking about the bounty in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group.Please ask your bounty-related questions in the MamunMKY4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed.7. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty programTwitter 60%Telegram 40%Week 1: 30/04-06/05Week 2: 7/05-14/05Week 3: 15/05-21/05Week 4: 22/05-28/05Week 5: 29/05-06/05Submit your weekly report on bounty thread.Twitter Campaign 200 MembersTelegram Campaign 150 MembersRewards1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 4 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow MahaDAO Twitter Page2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 500 followers.3. Participants have to make 3 new tweets and 5 retweets per week (maximum 1 retweet and 1 Tweet per day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 12 hours minimum.5. Participants must use #MahaDAO #Zealy #Airdrop #LetsGo #EthereumJOIN HERE: https://forms.gle/XbbT7VCdeshK2Ff46Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:1. Update your Telegram name to Your Name | MahaDAO.(Example: MamunMKY | MahaDAO)2. Replace your profile picture with MahaDAO.3. Participants can only wear one project name at a time. Wearing more thanone project in your telegram name will disqualify you from the campaign.4. Your telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You mustinteract with the Telegram account with which you have registered the campaign.Violation of this rule will lead to the removal of all earned stakes.5. Write at least 5 constructive messages in top exchange’s telegram groups (Example: Binance, Kucoin,Gate.io, MEXC etc). Posting messages on other groups won’t be counted.6. Spam or Deleted messages will not be counted. Hashtags "#" are not allowed in the conversation.7. Report your telegram message links weekly. Please obey the report dates and format.8. You must stay in the telegram group until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.9. You must wear MahaDAO avatar and text until the end of the campaign to receive your stakesJOIN HERE: https://forms.gle/GSUBLFWZCqdRsDmcADownload Avater
